task-wr.title: Using the Remote Log Server
task-wr.shortdesc: The remote log server uses ELK, a popular open-source log analytics engine that includes Kibana for web-based presentation and analysis.

context.p: US77159 / US83068 new topicMore information about Kibana and ELK, including documentation and tutorials, is widely available on the Internet.
For more information about deploying a remote log server, see .

note.p: If Titanium Server loses connectivity with the remote server, an alarm message is raised.

step.cmd: Use a browser to open Kibana on the log server.

info.p: Use the form http://ip_addr:5601, where ip_addr is the IP address of the remote log server.

step.cmd: Use the controls in Kibana to view or analyze logs from Titanium Server.

info.p: For help using Kibana, refer to the public documentation on the Internet.
